Este es un primer ejemplo con rCharts:

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis', comment=NA}
library(rCharts)
r1 <- rPlot(mpg ~ wt | am + vs, data = mtcars, type = "point", color = "gear")
r1$print('iframesrc', include_assets=TRUE)
```

Mostramos un segundo ejemplo:

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis', comment=NA}
data(economics, package = "ggplot2")
econ <- transform(economics, date = as.character(date))
m1 <- mPlot(x = "date", y = c("psavert", "uempmed"), type = "Line", data = econ)
m1$set(pointSize = 0, lineWidth = 1)
#m1$print('iframesrc', include_assets=TRUE)
#m1$show('iframesrc', cdn = TRUE)
m1$show('inline', include_assets = TRUE)
```
